channel.title: Scamming
channel.description: Ok, so i was sitting on Runescape at the G.E and i see all these people trying to scam others. So i sat there and watched them basicly fall for scams, and in my head i found it so amusing. At one point i even went off at this low level lure, who had previously tried to lure me. Point is, does anyone else find people being scammed amusing (when you just sit there and watch it)? and maybe share some experiences of what you have seen while just watching. :)

item.title: Scamming
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

Just now I encountered one of these meatheads claiming he could double my money, so I showed him 5 mil and asked if he could double that… Sure he said. I told him I didnt believe him, and that I wanted to try it with something smaller, so I gave him 250k and he actually doubled it, hoping I would give him the 5 mil :p… So I thanked him, and went on with my business…

The scammer got scammed hehe.

Read full topic

@r0ckstar96 wrote:

[quote=“k0 twin, post:17, topic:387160”]I don’t even understand this doubling money scam…

What is the scammers claim for how they do it?[/quote]

They say they have “Doubling software” sometimes

Actually there are some people who truly double money. A 1 : 50 ratio but yeah they’re there.
[/quote]

A 1:50 ratio wouldn’t be ‘doubling’ money now, would it?[/quote]
Of corse it is, you just don’t know it yet.

item.title: Scamming
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“k0 twin, post:21, topic:387160”][quote author=Rash link=topic=482960.msg3539995#msg3539995 date=1300796199]

I don’t even understand this doubling money scam…

What is the scammers claim for how they do it?

Probably the regular “Just trust me man, watch”.

The scammer has two accounts.

One is saying Doubling your money, the other is testifying that he did it.
[/quote]
I get that, I just don’t get why people believe they can actually “double money”

It makes no sense.[/quote]
Desperate for cash i guess, which makes no sense it’s so easy to get. :\

Read full topic

item.title: Scamming
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:15, topic:387160”][quote author=I Vain I link=topic=482960.msg3538249#msg3538249 date=1300672439]

I love scam duos.

Player A: Doubling money!
Player B: OMG he doubled me 500k! Legit!
Me: Show me 1m, Player B.
Player B can’t show anything since he’s a lvl 3 with nothing.
Me: Now gtfo, fucktards.
[/quote]What you got against level 3’s? I am level 3 and I gave you 2m and gave Cole 3m.

Nothing, I’m just saying most of them are one person multi-logged in. :P[/quote]

i did this once to fool my friend , i pretend i gave a lvl 3 noob all m stuff he wanted so badly , the next day at school he freaked out at me , after telling him it was me freaked out a bit more xD

Read full topic

item.title: Scamming
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“whattehp406, post:11, topic:387160”]i used to troll them by acting stupid

like: scammer: doubling money for free min is 500k
me: huh whats 500k
scammer: money it’s 500000gp’s
me: wtf is a gp
scammer: money
me: how do i get money
scammer: …

always lolling[/quote]

Lol i tend to do that alot to, mainly just to mates though.

Read full topic
